Faramarz Aslani

He is a composer, songwriter, skilled guitarist, and renowned singer of Iranian pop music. He began his singing career in the mid-1970s.

Siavash Ghomayshi

He is one of the prominent Persian pop singers and is recognized as the pioneer of trance music in Iran.

Habib Mohebian

He was a distinguished Iranian singer who brought new life to pop music with his unique style.

Mahasti

She was a singer of Iranian pop and traditional music who was given the title "Lady of the Golden Throat."

Ibrahim Hamedi

he is considered the greatest singer in the history of Persian pop. His distinctive features include a powerful and resonant voice.

Hayedeh

She was an Iranian traditional and pop singer with an extraordinary voice.
